reviewText: I have the complete four seasons dramas...Each story reveals the beauty of each season.  Each characters portray their parts perfectly.  There are some part of Summer Aroma which I think is still not possible...but the rest..good.

reviewText: I OWN MANY SERIES SUCH AS : WINTER SONATA, HOTELIER, STAIRWAY TO HEAVEN, AUTUMN IN MY HEART , DAE JANG GEUM, ALL 3 VOLUMNS AND LOVE STORY IN HARVARD AND MANY MORE , AND LOVED THEM ALL.  BUT I QUIT WATCHING THIS ONE HALF WAY THROUGH THE SERIES. ALL IN ALL I WAS VERY DISAPOINTED.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Having seen all of the four season series. First off the subtitles are horrible. If you know a few words in Korean that can help in the translation. The series is dull. The people are uninteresting, no good good guys, no bad guys just pointless people. This is the worst of the Seasons series Autumn in my Heart being the best. Not that it is great just much better than this one. Most acting in Korean series is exceptional here it is bland, vapid and boring. Now this may not be the actors fault but the directors, writers and relentless redundancy of most Korean series wearing thin. If you have not seen this give it a pass there are many other better and more interesting Kdramas. Alone in Love, Sam Soon, etc.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I loved all of the four season made but this one didn't live up to the other three to me. It had moments that were good but on the whole the movie let me down in every area including the music. I would recommend it as a part of the four season series but by itself I wouldn't.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is part of a set of dramas by the same director. There is also Autumn in my heart which also stars Song Seung-Heon and Winter Sonata which is the most popular out of the three. They are not connected in story but they share fabulous cinematography! the music is great. Only thing is be prepared for a far-fetched storyline that is almost expected of Korean MELO-Dramas...and for exaggerated repetitive moments! I still enjoyed it because I accepted that it's just the k-drama style. First timers...might find it corny and very slow! Don't say you weren't warned.
Title: N/A
